sectionText: This course provides an overview of the field of Educational Data Mining (EDM), a discipline concerned with the analysis of the unique and increasingly large-scale data that come from educational settings. This course will introduce students to EDM methods and applications, including exploratory approaches, student knowledge assessment, predictive modeling, and data visualization.  Students will learn through a hands-on approach, using standard software packages to apply algorithms, evaluate/validate their performance, and interpret their results.
